session.noconfirmation.name: Destroy without confirmation
session.noconfirmation.desc: Do not ask confirmation when deleting a building/unit.

session.backtowork.name: Back to Work
session.backtowork.desc: The unit will go back to work.

session.unload.name: Unload
session.unload.desc: Unload garrisoned units when a building/mechanical unit is selected.

session.leaveturret.name: Leave Turret Point
session.leaveturret.desc: Order an entity to leave a turret point.

session.unloadtype.name: Unload unit type
session.unloadtype.desc: Modifier to unload all units of type.

session.move.name: Force move
session.move.desc: Modifier to move to a point instead of another action (e.g. gather).

session.attack.name: Force attack
session.attack.desc: Modifier to attack instead of another action (e.g. capture).

session.attackmove.name: Attack Move
session.attackmove.desc: Modifier to attackmove when clicking on a point.

session.attackmoveUnit.name: Attack Move (unit only)
session.attackmoveUnit.desc: Modifier to attackmove targeting only units when clicking on a point.

session.garrison.name: Garrison
session.garrison.desc: Modifier to garrison when clicking on building.

session.occupyturret.name: Occupy Turret Point
session.occupyturret.desc: Modifier to occupy a turret when clicking on a turret holder.

session.autorallypoint.name: Auto-rally point
session.autorallypoint.desc: Modifier to set the rally point on the building itself.

session.guard.name: Guard
session.guard.desc: Modifier to escort/guard when clicking on unit/building.

session.repair.name: Repair
session.repair.desc: Modifier to repair when clicking on building/mechanical unit.

session.queue.name: Queue order
session.queue.desc: Modifier to queue unit orders instead of replacing.

session.pushorderfront.name: Push order in front
session.pushorderfront.desc: Modifier to execute this order, then go back to the current order.

session.orderone.name: Order one unit
session.orderone.desc: Modifier to order only one entity in selection.

session.batchtrain.name: Batch production
session.batchtrain.desc: Modifier to train units in batches.

session.massbarter.name: Mass barter
session.massbarter.desc: Modifier to barter bunch of resources.

session.masstribute.name: Mass tribute
session.masstribute.desc: Modifier to tribute bunch of resources.

session.fulltradeswap.name: Set trade to 100%
session.fulltradeswap.desc: Modifier to put the desired trade resource to 100%.

session.deselectgroup.name: Deselect unit type
session.deselectgroup.desc: Modifier to deselect units when clicking group icon, instead of selecting.

session.snaptoedges.name: Toggle snap-to-edge
session.snaptoedges.desc: Modifier to align new structures with nearby existing structure.

session.toggledefaultformation.name: Toggle default formation
session.toggledefaultformation.desc: Switch between null default formation and the last default formation used (defaults to 'box').

session.queueunit.1.name: Queue 1st unit
session.queueunit.1.desc: Add first unit type to queue.

session.queueunit.2.name: Queue 2nd unit
session.queueunit.2.desc: Add second unit type to queue.

session.queueunit.3.name: Queue 3rd unit
session.queueunit.3.desc: Add third unit type to queue.

session.queueunit.4.name: Queue 4th unit
session.queueunit.4.desc: Add fourth unit type to queue.

session.queueunit.5.name: Queue 5th unit
session.queueunit.5.desc: Add fivth unit type to queue.

session.queueunit.6.name: Queue 6th unit
session.queueunit.6.desc: Add sixth unit type to queue.

session.queueunit.7.name: Queue 7th unit
session.queueunit.7.desc: Add seventh unit type to queue.

session.queueunit.8.name: Queue 8th unit
session.queueunit.8.desc: Add eighth unit type to queue.

session.queueunit.autoqueueon.name: Activate auto-queue
session.queueunit.autoqueueon.desc: Turn on Auto-Queue for selected structures.

session.queueunit.autoqueueoff.name: Deactivate auto-queue
session.queueunit.autoqueueoff.desc: Turn off Auto-Queue for selected structures.

session.flare.name: Flare (hold)
session.flare.desc: Set the cursor to Flare while this hotkey is pressed.

session.flareactivate.name: Flare (toggle)
session.flareactivate.desc: Set the cursor to Flare. The hotkey can be released.

session.calltoarms.name: Call to arms
session.calltoarms.desc: Send the selected units on attack move to the specified location after dropping resources.
